'''''Footprints of the Traveler Vol. 2''''' is the second version trailer [[soundtrack]] album for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features 9 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one an original composition for the version trailers of ''Genshin Impact'' from [[Version 3.0]] to [[Version 3.8]].
